choose_language: Choose language / Оберіть мову / Выберите язык:
subscription_required: ❌ To use the bot, you need to subscribe to {channel}
welcome:
Welcome to KashHub 

 This is the best bot on the market, built from real requests by media buyers and marketers.

 All features borrowed from other bots have been polished and actually work.

 If it’s the Uniqueness Tool – it really makes your creatives unique.

 If it’s Text Hiding – it really hides your CTA with invisible characters from detection.

 Want to be the first to know when your deposit comes in? – ----- 

 All for you, with love from Uncle Kesh and his Team.
uniqueness_explanation:
🔍 **How does technical uniqueness work?**

The bot changes the digital “DNA” of your files. This is not just adding filters.
Rumor has it top teams do the same, but KashHub does it better.
✅ Result: looks identical to humans, but has different digital DNA for recognition systems.
invalid_copies_number: ❌ Please enter a number between 1 and 25
upload_file:
📤 **Upload your media file as a DOCUMENT (not photo/video)**

⚠️ Important: send via 📎 to keep quality and metadata.

Supported formats:
📹 Video: MP4, AVI, MOV, MKV, WEBM
🖼 Image: JPG, PNG, BMP, GIF, WEBP
processing:
⏳ Processing your file...

🔄 Creating {count} unique copies
⏱ This may take a few minutes
success:
✅ **Done!**

📦 Your unique files are packed in an archive
📊 Copies created: {count}

💡 Each file has its own digital DNA
error_file_too_large: ❌ File is too large! Max size: {max_size} MB
error_processing: ❌ Error while processing. Please try again.
error_no_file: ❌ Please send the file as a document (via 📎)
hide_text_explanation:
🙈 **Hide text with invisible characters**

📝 A zero-width space is inserted between each letter of your text.

✨ Result:
• Looks normal to the eye
• But technically split in code
• Helps bypass detection
• Useful for hiding keywords

💡 Send the text you want to hide:
send_text_to_hide: 📝 Send the text you want to hide:
hidden_text_result:
✅ **Text successfully hidden!**

📋 Copy the result below:

`{text}`

💡 An invisible character was added between each letter
smart_compress_explanation:
📉 **Smart compression for Facebook Ads**

🎯 Optimizes media for ads:

📸 **Images:**
• Convert to WebP/AVIF
• Resize to 1080x1080
• Keep max visual quality

🎬 **Videos:**
• H.265 (HEVC) codec
• Optimized for FB
• Compression without quality loss

📊 After processing, you’ll get a compression report
upload_file_compress:
📤 **Upload a file to compress**

⚠️ Send as a document via 📎

📸 Images: JPG, PNG, BMP
🎬 Videos: MP4, MOV, AVI
compression_report:
📊 **Compression report**

📁 Original size: {original_size} MB
📦 New size: {new_size} MB
📉 Reduced: {percent}%
⚡ Saved: {saved} MB

✅ Optimized for Facebook!
compressing:
🔄 Compressing file...

⏱ This may take a few minutes
queue_full:
❌ Queue is full! Try again later.

📊 In queue: {queue_size} files
too_many_tasks: ❌ You already have 3 files in progress. Wait until they finish.
cpu_overload:
⚠️ Server overloaded. Processing paused.

💻 CPU load: {cpu}%
⏱ Retrying in a few seconds...
video_downloader_explanation:
🎬 **Video downloader**

✅ Supported:
• TikTok
• YouTube Shorts
• Instagram Reels

📋 Features:
• Download in max quality
• Extract audio

⚙️ Limit: {max_size} MB
send_video_url: 📎 Send a link from TikTok, YouTube Shorts, or Instagram:
invalid_url: ❌ Invalid link. Must start with http:// or https://
unsupported_platform:
❌ Platform not supported. Use links from:
• TikTok
• YouTube Shorts
• Instagram
video_downloaded_large:
✅ Video downloaded from {platform}!
📊 Size: {size_mb} MB
⚠️ Sent as a document due to size
error_downloading: ❌ Error downloading. Check the link and try again.
download_more_or_menu: Download more or return to menu?
totp_menu:
🔐 **2FA Generator**

🎯 **Code:** `{code}`
🔑 **Secret:** `{secret}`
⏰ **Time left:** {remaining_time}s

💡 Code updates every 30s
📱 Use for two-factor authentication
totp_new_secret:
🎲 **New secret created!**

🎯 **Code:** `{code}`
🔑 **Secret:** `{secret}`
⏰ **Time left:** {remaining_time}s

💾 Save your secret
📱 Import to Google Authenticator or similar
totp_enter_secret:
⚙️ **Enter your secret key**

🔤 Must be Base32
📝 Example: JNXW24DTPEBXXX3NNFSGK2LO
totp_invalid_secret:
❌ Invalid secret key

✅ Must be Base32
📏 Length: 16–128
🔤 Characters: A-Z, 2-7
totp_custom_result:
⚙️ **Your key is active!**

🎯 **Code:** `{code}`
🔑 **Secret:** `{secret}`
⏰ **Time left:** {remaining_time}s

✅ Use this code to log in
totp_no_secret:
❌ Secret key not set

🔙 Create a new one in the menu
totp_qr_caption:
📱 **QR code for import**

Scan in:
• Google Authenticator
• Authy
• Microsoft Authenticator

🔑 Secret: `{secret}`
gmail_aliases_menu:
📧 **Gmail Aliases**

🎯 Generated from your base Gmail. Emails still arrive in the same inbox.

🔒 Only the counter is saved in DB
📊 Limit: {max_quota}/day
⚡ Remaining: **{remaining_quota}**
gmail_request_email:
📧 **Enter your Gmail**

📝 Example: `name@gmail.com`

💡 Not saved in DB
gmail_non_gmail_warning:
⚠️ Not a Gmail domain

+tag only works with Gmail/Workspace.

Use @gmail.com for predictable results.
gmail_quota_exceeded:
❌ Daily limit reached

🕐 Try again tomorrow
📊 Limit: 10/day
kashmail_menu_title:
📩 **Temporary Mail**

Create disposable email addresses and receive messages directly here!
kashmail_quota_exceeded: Daily quota exceeded. Try again tomorrow.
kashmail_generation_failed: Could not create email. Try later.
kashmail_waiting_instruction: I’ll check every 2–5s. You’ll get notified as soon as a message arrives!
kashmail_timeout_suggestion: No messages received. Try later or generate a new address.
kashmail_burn_explanation: Session ended. Address no longer valid.
error_occurred: An error occurred. Try again later.
keitaro_welcome:
🚀 **Keitaro Notifications Setup**

To receive conversions in Telegram:
1. Create integration profile
2. Select notification chat
3. Get Postback URL
4. Configure it in Keitaro

The bot will instantly send you registrations, deposits and other events!
keitaro_profile_info:
{status} **Keitaro Profile**

📎 **Postback URL:**
`{url}`

💬 **Default delivery:**
Chat: `{chat_id}`
Topic: `{topic_id}`

📊 Use URL in Keitaro S2S Postback settings
keitaro_select_chat:
💬 **Where to send notifications?**

Select chat for receiving Keitaro events:
keitaro_input_topic:
🗂 Enter topic ID (optional)

For supergroups with topics, enter thread ID or click «No topic»
keitaro_input_chat_id:
🆔 **Enter Chat ID**

Where to send notifications?

Example: `-1001234567890`
keitaro_invalid_chat: ❌ Invalid chat_id or bot has no access to the chat
keitaro_profile_created:
✅ **Profile created!**

📎 **Your Postback URL:**
`{url}`

✏️ Paste this URL in Keitaro S2S Postback settings
keitaro_test_failed: ❌ Failed to send test. Check chat settings
